data.body: Fix list and final cut ordering so default sort is priority ascending (0 highest), then status order (open, in_progress, closed, others). Remove verification/in-progress special-casing for ordering while preserving user title sorting.
data.description: Fix list and final cut ordering so default sort is priority ascending (0 highest), then status order (open, in_progress, closed, others). Remove verification/in-progress special-casing for ordering while preserving user title sorting.
data.title: Sort beats by priority then status in List/Final Cut
